item.title: Apache Hop 2.14 is available!!
item.description: After about two months of work on 84 tickets by 8 contributors, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.14.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible. Â Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.14 brings: Updated release cycle Mail server metadata type Various improvements and fixes Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.
